events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position, acknowledging their submission and resume.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department given the candidate's background in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s recruitment process and coordinate next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess their software engineering skills and relevant experience.
The candidate responded promptly and positively after the initial screening, expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview has been successfully scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate to demonstrate coding and problem-solving skills.
